Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: I have to say, this is the best Japanese sushi I‚Äôve had by now in Amsterdam. I will definitely go back for another nice meal. I love their sushi! Good job!

Review Text: They had problems with pay machine and we couldn‚Äôt pay with any credit card, we should went out to look for some atm. The food was good but overpriced

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: A really nice Japanese restaurant with humble employees and good food for a fair price.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: The portion sizes are ridiculously small. The 5 pc sashimi is equivalent to 2 pcs because they are so thin and small. The prices don't reflect the sizes given. You have to spend too much to get full and us not worth the price. The quality isn't bad. The portion sizes however are unacceptable.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: One of those places where everything is spot on! Definitely worth trying if you‚Äôre in the mood for some Japanese / sushi!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Last Sunday 9 Feb was incredibly windy. Actually it was stormy but we took the risk and we went out for dinner at Tomo Sushi. It is located in the city centre close to Rembrandt square. It was a quiet place. Of course most of the people ‚Ä¶

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Excellent food, pleasant and hospitable service. Prices on the medium to high side, especially 1.50 for a glass of tap water seems a bit avaricious. The music, jazzy easy listening, might be toned down a bit. But I would gladly go there again.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text:
Amazing sushi!
Extremely fresh fish, very nice staff and a great experience!!
A true Japanese restaurant.
I'll definitely come back. Thanks!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: The sushi rice was dry as if It were datos ago, the salm√≥n smelled bad, in the vegetarian sushi i found pieces of tuna or i don't know what fish, and on the phone the manager very unpleasant he didn't want to change the dishes, expensive and horrible, I had throw everything away

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Soooo tasty! Nice service, beautiful but small place. Perfect for dates

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: A nice restaurant with friendly staff. Make a reservation as it gets busy, and note that the rolls are quite small so you may need to order more than expected. Sashimi was fresh (we just had the scallops) and ingredients overall were pretty good. Nothing blew me away but I would come again.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text:
One of the best sushi I've ever had
The food was so perfectly good and the service was lovely while the place looks very cozy! ‚Ä¶

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: I went to the restaurant to pick up my order and I saw how they dropped an order on the floor and he returned it to the taper, when I reproached him that it was dirty he told me not to worry that it is not for me. I decided to cancel my order and the guy got very aggressive. a shame

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: We tried so many dishes. They were all delicious. Sushi was fresh.  Also make a great latte.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Excelent service and staff ! Delicious Shashimi and Sushi rolls ! üòç

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: One of my favourite Japanese restaurants in Amsterdam. Almost tried everything. My favourite are the hotategai and chirashi, they are a real treat! They also have grilled meat which are very good. The service is fast and friendly.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Quality sushi, nice atmosphere. I sampled a set of nigiris and I was pleasantly surprised. Toro and uni highlighted this lovely meal. Highly recommendable for those who know and appreciate good quality sushi.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Got a take away for the first time today. The sushi was nothing special, the quality did not feel superior and therefore I thought it was very overpriced for what it is. First and last time ordering here.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Lovely cozy place. Loved their sushi. Service is beyond expectations. Well done!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Great service and location. The food tasted good but the portions were super small and it was over priced for what you get. I hope they will have a combo for veggie sushi as buying everything separate adds up.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Summary: Taste was good after all. Presentation of the food could have been better. ‚Ä¶

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Beautiful interior, staff was super nice, squeezed us in without reservation, sushi was amazing and service was on point. Will defly come again!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Hidden in an alley, not at a very obvious spot. The perfect place to have a decent Japanese dinner. Friendly and customer oriented staff. Reservation is strongly recommended or you will end up sitting at the bar side.

Name: tomo sushi

Review Text: A hidden gem! It‚Äôs a small resto in an alley, not easy to find but really a must-go. All the staffs are Japanese so you will get the fine quality food, and the warm, elegant polite service.

Review Text: Absolutely delicious! The freshest, tastiest sashimi and sushi, perfectly cooked beef and delicious prawn tempura! We had such a great evening here, so lucky to get a table on a busy night. Service was impeccable. We will be back for sure! Thank you!!!

Review Text: The service was very nice but the food was fine. I was very underwhelmed by the rolls, especially the spicy tuna, and appetizers but thought the nigiri was good. This is not in the same league as the great sushi restaurants in Amsterdam but I don't think they try to play there

sushi.. OMG.. speechless.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: I have tried a lot of sushi restaurants and take-out places in Amsterdam (and elsewhere), but Tomo really has the best sushi I have ever had. I'm also a big wine lover and the wines they have here are impeccable and great great great quality for what you are paying!!! I would really recommend going here.

Name: tomo sushi

Review Text: Amazing, freshly made sushi, really nice and attentive servers and the restaurant interior was stylish and the chairs very comfortable. Me and my friend were very surprised and happy to see our favourite plum wine from our time in Japan on the menu!

Name: tomo sushi

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: High quality authentic sushi!!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: My boyfriend an me found this place by accident while on vacation in Amsterdam. If you are a fan of sushi you need to visit this place. Amazing sushi of high quality and very polite and friendly service as well. Always worth a visit.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: The best sushi I've had in Amsterdam so far, and I've been looking for a while. There's a wider selection of fish and different dishes, so you can be a little adventurous here and expand your tastes.  It's not hugely expensive either, so if ‚Ä¶

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: The sushi was very good, as well as the sake. Excellent choice!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Fantastic sushi, some of the best I've had anywhere, which combined with excellent, attentive service and a nice atmosphere made for a great meal. I would thoroughly recommend Tomo Sushi. ‚Ç¨70 bought enough for two people to have to be ‚Ä¶

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Expensive and small portions of sushi and rice. Groya is horrible as well. Very overrated, wouldn‚Äôt recommend

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Tomo Sushi is wonderful restaurant. The restaurant is small and cozy with a bar next to the kitchen and counter, and a section with restaurant tables. The restaurant serves authentic Japanese food and drinks. The food is prepared very well with eye for detail. The staff is friendly.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Really good service! Really friendly and welcoming! Food was good too, maybe not the best sushi of Amsterdam but good enough.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: I went here for my birthday. Amazing sushi, decent prices, and the staff were so great! They gave me dessert with a big sparkler, and we hadn‚Äôt asked them to do that! I had the best time here!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Ordered gyoza and a sushi/sashimi set; gyoza was completely burnt, cut in half (?) and placed on a bed of green salad (?). sushi and sashimi were below average

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Wonderful experience. Tomo sushi is the meal time experience you wish to get after a long day or when you really need a good time. The food is heavenly good (specialy the temakis like waaaw), the staff is suuupeer kind and helpful and the kitchen is lighting fast. I recommand of course!!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Have eaten here many times the selection is great with the service to match. It can be busy so it maybe best to reserve although they have accommodated me many times without one. If no tables are available sitting up at the sushi bar watching the chefs prepare the dishes is fun. See you soon Tomo

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Very friendly service and superb food!

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Clean and cozy place. Sushi is delicious, much better than average taste. They have japanese whisky (like yamazaki , hibiki), sake, green tea and sapporo bier (but they don t have asahi bier) You may sit on the tables or on the bar table in front of chefs.

Name: tomo sushi
Review Text: Never ordering from your restaurant again.  I‚Äôve been a customer for a long time.  I ordered food for delivery and it never came.  I called you and you assured me it would be there shortly. It never ever showed up.

Review Text: Very fresh, friendly staff but the price is way too high. 20-30% too much.

Review Text: Beautiful sushi, beautiful service. As I write this I'm hoping to squeeze one last trip in this evening before I leave Amsterdam. I would say, if you think you've ordered enough, just go ahead and order a bit more because you will ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Nice sushiplace next to the busy Rembrandtsplein. Its not big but the sushi is way better than I suspected in this area. Everything was fresh and nice. When we come back to Amsterdam we will try another menu here.
